Wacky Thing.description: How did you get this? You would have had to fight off a very powerful foe to get this...

Astrostew.description: You're not sure what is in this, but it must be safe, right?

Super Syrum.description: A supernatural concoction of untold power. [[c:red]DEV ITEM[c:]]].
